description: Although we can't protect children from accidental injuries forever,but we can prevent them from suffering serious consequences-especially those related to the head. Wearing a helmet is a simple method. Choose a suitable and comfortable helmet with sufficient cushioning and breathability to ensure that the child's head is protected. Let the child choose the color, design or shape of the helmet that she likes so that she will prefer to wear it.
